documentation-do-not-use-as-data.0-href-key: the key for each character is used as the indv page identifier, e.g. broken_oath.html
documentation-do-not-use-as-data.1B-main-body: These are all filter values, used as data-<value> in the search page
documentation-do-not-use-as-data.1D-main-body: characterCode must be the same as the corresponding owner in charData.json, used to generate link to char page
documentation-do-not-use-as-data.2-new: new is the value that generates the NEW tag on the search page
documentation-do-not-use-as-data.3B-ovr-gImgPath: Overwrites grimoire images (search page & portrait in indv grimoire page)
documentation-do-not-use-as-data.3C-ovr-gSkillPath: Overwrites skill images (skills in indv grimoire page)
